title: Wear Me Again - Android Wear
summary: Change the look of your SmartWatch.
developer: 123 Kids Fun Apps - Educational apps for Kids
description: Android Wear appChange the look of your Android Wear watch. You can choose from lots of watch faces. You'll find there both Christmas and New Year backgrounds. Have a great fun. Check our app now!-----------------------How to pair your watch?If you’re pairing your watch for the first time, make sure your phone is connected to mobile data or Wi-Fi. You need a data connection to complete setup. You should also keep the watch connected to power during setup.1. Turn on your watch, and make sure it is within a few feet of your phone.2. Download and install the Android Wear app  on your phone. You can also search for “Android Wear” on Google Play.3. Open the Android Wear app  on your phone and follow the onscreen instructions. You'll be able to turn on Bluetooth during set up, if it isn't already on.4, When you launch the Android Wear app, you may see a message that you need to update your Google app and reinstall the Android Wear app.5. On your phone, you’ll see a list of nearby devices. Touch your watch’s name. You can check the name of your watch on its screen.6, You’ll see a pairing code on your phone and watch. Check that the codes match.7. Touch Pair on your phone, then touch Pair on your watch. Make sure to touch both screens. You’ll see a confirmation message once your watch is paired. This can take a few minutes, so please be patient.Possible software update: Depending on when you bought your watch, your watch may automatically download and install an update after you pair with a phone for the first time. Your watch will automatically restart after updating itself.8. On your phone, follow the onscreen instructions to turn on watch notifications.9. You’re all done, but we recommend turning on Google Now & Location to have the best Android Wear experience.
descriptionHTML:
Android Wear app

Change the look of your Android Wear watch. You can choose from lots of watch faces. You'll find there both Christmas and New Year backgrounds. Have a great fun.

Check our app now!

-----------------------

How to pair your watch?

If you’re pairing your watch for the first time, make sure your phone is connected to mobile data or Wi-Fi. You need a data connection to complete setup. You should also keep the watch connected to power during setup.

1. Turn on your watch, and make sure it is within a few feet of your phone.
2. Download and install the Android Wear app on your phone. You can also search for “Android Wear” on Google Play.
3. Open the Android Wear app on your phone and follow the onscreen instructions. You'll be able to turn on Bluetooth during set up, if it isn't already on.
4, When you launch the Android Wear app, you may see a message that you need to update your Google app and reinstall the Android Wear app.
5. On your phone, you’ll see a list of nearby devices. Touch your watch’s name. You can check the name of your watch on its screen.
6, You’ll see a pairing code on your phone and watch. Check that the codes match.
7. Touch Pair on your phone, then touch Pair on your watch. Make sure to touch both screens. You’ll see a confirmation message once your watch is paired. This can take a few minutes, so please be patient.

Possible software update: Depending on when you bought your watch, your watch may automatically download and install an update after you pair with a phone for the first time. Your watch will automatically restart after updating itself.

8. On your phone, follow the onscreen instructions to turn on watch notifications.
9. You’re all done, but we recommend turning on Google Now & Location to have the best Android Wear experience.
